response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? ich dachte, die datenschutz-grundverordnung (dsgvo) wäre dazu da, um unsere privatsphäre zu schützen. doch offensichtlich haben sich manche firmen nicht daran gebunden. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #dsgvo"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? i thought the general data protection regulation (gdpr) was meant to protect our privacy. yet, apparently some firms haven't bothered to comply. #dataprivacy #privatesphere #gdpr"

this post critically examines the fact that some companies still collect and sell personal data despite the implementation of the general data protection regulation (gdpr) in the european union, which aimed to protect individuals' privacy and personal information. the user questions the effectiveness of the regulation and expresses their frustration with companies not adhering to it. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (private sphere), and #dsgvo (gdpr in german) are used to reach a wider audience and connect the post to ongoing discussions around data privacy.
